de.thm.mni.nn.perceptron.impl

Class Neuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thm.mni.nn.perceptron.impl.Neuron

  • public class Neuron
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a Neuron in a Neuronal Network.
    Author:
    Marcel Walden

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EActivationFunction activationFunction
      Activation Function used by the Neuron.
      private double activationValue
      Defines the Activationvalue of the Neuron.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Axon> incomingDendrites
      List of all Dendrites the Neuron is connected to.
      private double net_input
      The net_input value specifies the incoming Signals of all connected Dendrites
      private ENeuronType neuronType
      Specification of the Neurons type.

    • Field Detail

      • activationValue

        private double activationValue
        Defines the Activationvalue of the Neuron. This is used when the Neuron is of Type Input.

      • net_input

        private double net_input
        The net_input value specifies the incoming Signals of all connected Dendrites

      • incomingDendrites

        private java.util.ArrayList<Axon> incomingDendrites
        List of all Dendrites the Neuron is connected to.

      • activationFunction

        private EActivationFunction activationFunction
        Activation Function used by the Neuron.

      • neuronType

        private ENeuronType neuronType
        Specification of the Neurons type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Neuron

        public Neuron(EActivationFunction activationFunction,
      ENeuronType neuronType)
        Constructor to be used for creating new Neurons. Adds the new Neuron to the given Perceptrons Neuron-List for later usage.
        Parameters:
        activationFunction - The Activation Function used by the Neuron.
        neuronType - Specifies the Type of the Neuron (INPUT, OUTPUT, HIDDEN)

    • Method Detail

      • getActivationFunction

        public EActivationFunction getActivationFunction()
        Getter-Method for the Activation-Function used by the Neuron.
        Returns:
        the activationFunction

      • getNeuronType

        public ENeuronType getNeuronType()
        Getter Method for the Neuron Type.
        Returns:
        the neuronType

      • calculateOutput

        private double calculateOutput()
        Calculates the output of the Neuron by using the specified Activation Function. All of the Activationfunctions are specified here. If a not supported Function is chosen
        Returns:
        Functionvalue of the Activation Function.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - The UnsupportedOperationExeption is thrown when a not implemented Activationfunction is used.

      • calculateNetInput

        private void calculateNetInput()
        Calculates the Network Input of the Neuron by iterating over the Dendrites.

      • getActivationValue

        public double getActivationValue()
        Returns the Activation Value of this Neuron.
        Returns:
        This Neurons Activation Value.

      • connectNewDendrite

        public java.lang.Boolean connectNewDendrite(Axon toConnect)
        Inserts an Axon to the List of the Neurons incoming Dendrites.
        Parameters:
        toConnect - The Axon that should be connected to the Neuron
        Returns:
        TRUE when Axon was inserted, FALSE when Axon is already connected to the Neuron.

      • propagateMe

        public void propagateMe()
        Calculates the Propagation for this Neuron. Uses the sum over all Products between Axons Starting Point and the Axons Weight.

      • doTraining

        public double doTraining(double teaching_input)
        Training Method for the Neuron.
        Returns:
        Double Value that is defines the Training Value (Will be corrected later...)
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - The UnsupportedOperationExeption is thrown when a not implemented Activationfunction is used.

      • getMyDendrites

        public Axon[] getMyDendrites()
        Returns all Axons that are connected as Dendrites to the Neuron
        Returns:
        An Array containing all the Dendrites connected to the Neuron.
